Name: Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD
About the game: Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD is a not-so-serious adventure that brings together mechanics from Action RPG and RTS games. You’ll control Kofi, a weak, lazy and unlucky videogame character that will be followed by a group of interesting (and pathetic) characters aiding him to live a great adventure. Game features Videogame characters that know they’re videogame characters. Mechanics from RTS, RPG and graphic adventure. Explore Neighborwood and uncover loads of secrets. Real-time combat similar to Action RPG’s with troops control. Gear your troops up to achieve victory. Troop Captains with special skills. The story will immerse you in a comic adventure with tons of situations and characters. Voice acting! Cool soundtrack inpired by JRPG. Your sword’s broken and your best friend’s a booger, but you can ride a direwolf.
